reference.notes: Elements References -------- ---------- Sc Ti V Cr Mn Fe Co Ni Cu Zn: N. B. Balabanov, K. A. Peterson, Systematically convergent basis sets for transition metals. I. All-electron correlation consistent basis sets for the 3d elements Sc?Zn, J. Chem. Phys. 123, 64107 (2005). Sc Ti V Cr Mn Fe Co Ni Cu Zn: E. D. Hedegård, J. Kongsted and S. P. A. Sauer, Optimized Basis sets for Calculation of Electron Paramagnetic Resonance Hyperfine Coupling Constants: aug-cc-pVTZ-J for the 3d atoms Sc-Zn, J. Chem. Theory Comput. 7, 4077-4087 (2011).
